clockmaker.name: Clockmaker
clockmaker.description: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

snakecharmer.name: Snake Charmer
snakecharmer.description: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

mathematician.name: Mathematician
mathematician.description: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

flowergirl.name: Flowergirl
flowergirl.description: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

towncrier.name: Town Crier
towncrier.description: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

savant.name: Savant
savant.description: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

seamstress.name: Seamstress
seamstress.description: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

philosopher.name: Philosopher
philosopher.description: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

artist.name: Artist
artist.description: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.description: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

sage.name: Sage
sage.description: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

mutant.name: Mutant
mutant.description: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

sweetheart.name: Sweetheart
sweetheart.description: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

barber.name: Barber
barber.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

eviltwin.name: Evil Twin
eviltwin.description: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

cerenovus.name: Cerenovus
cerenovus.description: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

pithag.name: Pit-Hag
pithag.description: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

fanggu.name: Fang Gu
fanggu.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

vigormortis.name: Vigormortis
vigormortis.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]

nodashii.name: No Dashii
nodashii.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.

vortox.name: Vortox
vortox.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

butcher.name: Butcher
butcher.description: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

bonecollector.name: Bone Collector
bonecollector.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

harlot.name: Harlot
harlot.description: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

barista.name: Barista
barista.description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

deviant.name: Deviant
deviant.description: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.
